column3: Please don't shout {{c1::at}} me! Try to calm down.
I saw Emma and shouted {{c1::to}} her, but she didn't hear me.
She was so angry, she threw a book {{c1::at}} the wall.
If you don't want that sandwich, throw it {{c1::to}} the birds. They'll eat it.
Don't throw stones {{c1::at}} the birds. It's cruel.
It was very noisy in the club, and we had to shout {{c1::to}} each other to be heard.
